"This is Perseus, to whom am I speaking?" said Perseus as he looked at
a ma=
p of thier facility, looking for the power room.

eus followed and discovered that they had found a way

ll was still dark.

light coming in.

on, that light

d on the

all another "meeting" when a signal came over the

rkness.  Small lights flicker in the distance, some tired

something to say.

irs of lights.

is going

ago.  We were trying to

r names?  I'm Perseus"
